name: FLYT - A Dashing Adventure!
description:
FLYT is an arcade style dash through a sky filled with floating obstacles and high-speed perils. How far can YOU fly?

----------

ONE-TOUCH GAMEPLAY
All you need is to tap & hold to fly. You can even use a quick swipe to dash out of the way.

FROM EASY TO IMPOSSIBLE
Not that great at these kinds of games? Don't worry, the challenge increases the farther you go!

SPLIT SECOND TIMING
FLYT gives you a split second to recover before a collision – those make-or-break maneuvers are essential for record setting runs!

HYPERSONIC SPEED!
No pressure in buying power ups, FLYT has only one (and its totally FREE): Hypersonic Speed. Become invulnerable and blast ahead for a meteoric gain!
